short_summary: Internal and External Audits (Supply Arrangement PASS)
full_summary:
### Internal Audit Services - Senior Auditor

#### Solicitation Number: 20220103

 #####Announcement Date: September 29, 2022

The Public Prosecution Service of Canada is soliciting proposals from eligible Supply Arrangement Holders to provide Internal Audit Services - Senior Auditor.

#### Description of the Requirement:
The successful candidate will contribute to the completion of internal audits and related tasks, as required, to support the Internal Evaluation and Audit Division.

#### Eligibility:
Eligible Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZQ-180001 who have qualified under the following category (Stream 1): Internal Audit are invited to participate.

#### Proposal Submission Instructions:
Supply Arrangement Holders identified above are invited to submit their proposals, which shall include the following:

* A detailed proposal outlining their qualifications, experience, and approach to providing internal audit services.

#### Key Dates:

* Publication Date: September 29, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: October 14, 2022 (2:00 PM)
* Amendment Date: October 6, 2022
* Expected Contract Start Date: Not Specified
* Expected Contract End Date: Not Specified

#### Contact Information:
Edith Hamann, Director
Public Prosecution Service of Canada
160 Elgin Street, 12th Floor, Ottawa, ON K1A 0H
Phone: 613-668-9501
Email: [edith.hamann@ppsc-sppc.gc.ca](mailto:edith.hamann@ppsc-sppc.gc.ca)

#### Attachments:
More information can be found in the attached documents:

* [Notice](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/29/de3000321da7407543564a66dd053eeb/npp_pass_sa_20220103.pdf)
* [Proposal](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/29/53f14a5424a9a73a588af7d83e18252b/apm_pass_sa_20220103.pdf)

Note: This is a bidded procurement under the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA). The requirement is open to those located within Ontario (except NCR).

---


The following changes were made:
* Created a clear and concise title for the rewritten entry
* Removed redundant and unnecessary information
* Improved sentence structure and clarity throughout the text
* Standardized formatting
